sorular.soru: Where is a horse rider allowed to ride if there is no bridle path present?

feedback.metin: A horse rider should use the bridle path, if present. If there is no bridle path, he or she is allowed to choose between the carriageway and the verge. A horse rider is not allowed to use the cycle path, cycle/moped path or foot path.

sorular.soru: Which vehicles are you not allowed to drive during a driving ban?

feedback.metin: During a driving ban you are not allowed to drive any vehicle. So not only driving a passenger car is prohibited, but also a brommobiel, moped or snorfiets. Even riding a bicycle is not allowed.
